text: He para wong mukmin, sira padha elinga kebungahan paparingng Allah marang sira (hiya iku nalika perang Khandak) sira tinempuh ing mungsuh kang gogolongan, Ingsun banjur ngididake angin, kanthi bala Malaikat kang tanpa wilangan nanging sira ora weruh. Allah iku mirsani samu barang kang padha sira lakoni
